text: @toryboypierce @COVID19 @MattHancock There should be no blame - the goal of 100k target was deliberately set high to focus everyone on pushing forward with the testing. No doubt the media will be working up to frenzy ready to call for apologies & resignations. Let's instead just get behind the government.
